name: Small Handlebar Bag
description: Modest in size but big on features. Pass-through straps, wooden support and full length leather back add up to create a robust, less saggy bag. Our Small Handlebar Bag is perfect for your map, wallet and cell phone...with enough extra room for a light windshell. Can also be used as a saddlebag--the 2 mounting straps line up with the Brooks bag loops. > More product info here > Please read before ordering! Available in: • Ranger Tan waxed canvas • Olive waxed canvas • Black waxed canvas

name: Handlebar Bag
description: A "glove compartment" for your bike. Looking for a handlebar bag that's not too small (or large!) and has all the pockets in the right place? Our Handlebar Bag is designed for you. Roomy, but not droopy, you'll appreciate the extra storage space when weather changes or you're about to bonk. One-handed access to smaller items without dismounting. > More product info here > Please read before ordering! Available in: • Ranger Tan waxed canvas • Olive waxed canvas • Black waxed canvas

name: Boxy Rando Bag
description: We pay homage to the French handlebar bag, while incorporating some time-saving features for the long distance cyclist. Our Boxy Rando Bag is "medium-sized"; perfect for smaller frames or for those riders who don't plan on bringing the kitchen sink. This bag is sized to fit the Nitto M-12 rack and other *similarly sized* Randonneur style front racks. Non-standard sized mini racks and other rack styles will NOT mount securely. Please contact me with any fit questions before purchase. A note on decaleurs: It goes without saying that the addition of a decaleur will provide the most wobble-free mount--it's essential if you're riding rough roads or carrying a heavy load. But running a couple of cords to the handlebars (along with our multi-layered stiffener) can help stabilize the bag in less stressful conditions. You might want to test it with the cords first. You can always install a decaleur if it's not stable enough for your needs. > More product info here > Please read before ordering! Available in: • Ranger Tan waxed canvas • Olive waxed canvas • Black waxed canvas > SHOULDER STRAP option

name: Tall Rando Bag
description: A bigger bag for bigger bikes. If you have a large gap to fill between your rack and handlebar, a taller bag makes sense. Our Tall Rando Bag weighs only 4 oz. more than our standard Boxy Rando Bag, but gives you 37% (3 L) extra storage space; there's not much of a weight penalty. (Also, our front and rear pockets have been upsized compared to our Boxy Bag.) The only caveat is that swaying will become more of an issue, so you'll want to seriously consider adding a decaleur. This bag is designed to only be used on a small Randonneur front rack (Nitto M-12 shown). Other rack styles will not mount securely. A note on decaleurs: It goes without saying that the addition of a decaleur will provide the most wobble-free mount--it's essential if you're riding rough roads or carrying a heavy load. But running a couple of cords to the handlebars (along with our multi-layered stiffener) can help stabilize the bag in less stressful conditions. You might want to test it with the cords first. You can always install a decaleur if it's not stable enough for your needs. > More product info here > Please read before ordering! Available in: • Ranger Tan waxed canvas • Olive waxed canvas • Black waxed canvas > SHOULDER STRAP option

name: Roll Bag
description: Never leave your tools at home. Now you can keep organized with our Roll Bag. Unfurl it and everything is at your fingertips; no more hunting for that Allen key. Snug and compact, yet expandable; you'll barely know it's there until you really need it. Mounting straps are designed for Brooks saddles with bag loops...or just toss it into your larger saddle bag. (Please note that this is a minimalist bag designed to hold a tube, patch kit, multitool and some spare change. Best not to overstuff it.) > More product info here > Please read before ordering! Available in: • Ranger Tan waxed canvas • Olive waxed canvas • Black waxed canvas

name: Medium Saddlebag
description: A full featured bag in "just the right" size. Our Medium Bag is a perfect match for longer training rides or day tours, allowing you to bring more than the bare necessities; yet its narrow profile is unobtrusive and streamlined. The expandable collar will easily accommodate a windshell and a second helping of fig bars. Mounting straps are designed for Brooks saddles with bag loops. > More product info here > Please read before ordering! Available in: • Ranger Tan waxed canvas • Olive waxed canvas • Black waxed canvas > LEATHER LASHING STRAP SET option > NYLON LASHING STRAP SET option

name: Medium/Large Saddlebag
description: Our Medium/Large Saddlebag is the big brother of our Medium Saddlebag. It holds 64% (2 L) more for those long days in the saddle. The expandable collar and side pockets further increases capacity. The beauty is in the "V" shape, tapering from its wide mouth to its extra narrow seatpost area. In most cases it won't interfere with you or your bike. Mounting straps are designed for Brooks saddles with bag loops. > More product info here > Please read before ordering! Available in: • Ranger Tan waxed canvas • Olive waxed canvas • Black waxed canvas > LEATHER LASHING STRAP SET option > NYLON LASHING STRAP SET option

name: Large Saddlebag
description: Fine tuning an old classic. Saddlebags have been around forever. I'm not one to break with tradition, but I felt there were a few issues that needed improvement. Our Large Bag comes with a leather "stand-off" that angles the bag to a more upright position, which addresses 3 problems: 1. Minimizes "thigh rub"--brushing your legs against the bag. 2. Helps prevent valuables from falling out of the pockets. 3. Keeps the bag off the brake cable and seat post clamp. An internal stiffener works in conjunction with the stand-off to stop the bag from collapsing around the seatpost area. The stiffener also prevents the bag from sagging and rubbing the tire. At 5.5 liters, this bag is compact sized and I would consider it a "smallish" large. Mounting straps are designed for Brooks saddles with bag loops. > More product info here > Please read before ordering! Available in: • Ranger Tan waxed canvas • Olive waxed canvas • Black waxed canvas > LEATHER LASHING STRAP SET option > NYLON LASHING STRAP SET option

name: Leather Strap - 3 sizes available
description: Fits Brooks saddles. This traditional strap is made from premium "ENGLISH BRIDLE" leather (9 oz.) 100% vegetable-tanned from top-grade U.S. steer hides. Heavy-duty buckles are nickel plated. 5/8" wide. Sold individually. $3.95 for 7.5 inch strap $4.50 for 10.25 inch strap $5.95 for 15 inch strap > More product info here > Please read before ordering!

name: Leather Lashing Strap Set
description: Extra capacity for those bulky items. Use our premium "English Bridle" leather straps to lash on a jacket or rain pants. Fits our Medium Saddlebag and Large Saddlebag ONLY. Includes two 15" straps plus two upper D-rings. > More product info here > Please read before ordering!

name: Nylon Lashing Strap Set
description: Extra capacity for those bulky items. Use our nylon webbing straps to lash on a jacket or rain pants. Weighs next to nothing, cinches tight and packs away small. It's a little longer than our leather lashing straps. Fits our Medium Saddlebag and Large Saddlebag ONLY. Includes two 20" straps plus two upper D-rings. > More product info here > Please read before ordering!

name: Shoulder Strap
description: Convenient for off-bike excursions. Our adjustable shoulder strap clips to the D-rings of our Boxy Rando and Tall Rando Bags ONLY*. Lightweight and packs small. The hooks swivel to prevent twisting of the strap. Perfect for carrying your bag into the corner market or coffeehouse. Not intended for extra heavy loads or extended hikes. *Not recommended for use with our Handlebar Bags. These bags will tilt when using a shoulder strap. > More product info here > Please read before ordering!

name: Leather Washers
description: A finishing touch for mounting fenders. Leather washers are the traditional choice for mounting metal fenders and racks--it's a perfect material for dampening vibration and silencing rattles. Ours are made from premium "ENGLISH BRIDLE" leather (9 oz.) 100% vegetable-tanned from top-grade U.S. steer hides. Thick and firm! I hand punch these, so they're not machine centered perfect, but close to it. 5/8" OD, 3/16" ID, 1/8"+ thick. (M5 bolt pictured for reference, not included.) $3.95 for 6 washers $5.95 for 12 washers > More product info here > Please read before ordering!

name: Martexin Original Wax
description: Reproof the old fashioned way. If you ride rain or shine, your canvas bag will appreciate an occasional touch-up or re-application of wax. You probably already proof your Brooks saddle; canvas also needs a little preventive maintenance for best performance. 1.5 oz. tin is enough to treat a larger sized bag. $3.95 for 1 tin $10.50 for 3 tins > More product info here > Please read before ordering!
